author: Daniel Greene
description:
Joe Abercrombie returns with The Devils (get the book here: https://bookshop.org/a/89948/9781250880055), a bold new dark fantasy filled with politics, violence, and his signature dialogue. In this spoiler-free review, I dive into what makes The Devils such n interesting entry in Abercrombie’s body of work. Does it live up to The First Law? Is this the start of a new grimdark classic? Is it even Grimdark? Find out as I break down the themes, characters, pacing, and what longtime fans and newcomers can expect.

📚 Get Joe Abercrombie’s The Devils: [insert affiliate link]

title: The Devils by Joe Abercrombie – His Strangest, Sharpest Turn Yet? (Spoiler-Free Review)
